scripts.build: echo "The build step is not required when using JavaScript!" && exit 0
scripts.logs-insights: aws logs start-query --log-group-name /aws/lambda/LambdaSqsBestPracticesCdkStack-MyLambdaFunction --start-time $(date -d '1 hour ago' +%s) --end-time $(date +%s) --query-string "$(cat queries/log-insights.txt)"
